00023 #ifndef _INTERNAL_COMM_COMMANDS_H_
00024 #define _INTERNAL_COMM_COMMANDS_H_
00025 
00026 /* For turning on/off the driver outputs the same commands is sent as to the driver modules */
00027 
00028 //All the internal communication commands should be between 0xC0 - 0xEF except BUS_CMDs which are sent internally
00029 
00031 #define INT_COMM_TURN_DEVICE_OFF                                                0xC0
00033 #define INT_COMM_PULL_THE_PLUG                                                  0xC1
00034 
00036 #define INT_COMM_AUX_CHANGE_OUTPUT_PIN                  0xC2
00038 #define INT_COMM_AUX_READ_INPUT_PIN                                     0xC3
00040 #define INT_COMM_GET_BAND_BCD_STATUS                            0xC4
00042 #define INT_COMM_PS2_KEYPRESSED                                                 0xC5
00044 #define INT_COMM_PC_CTRL                                                                                0xC6
00045 
00046 #endif
